website_summaries.verdict: Carries a nice price point, and it's made to fit smaller-sized boxes tightly.
pros: Includes a drawstring that reduces the mess when you remove the liner
Consists of 65 percent recycled plastic, which makes it more eco-friendly than other liners
Does a decent job of resisting tears with a 3-ply material
cons: At 22 by 18 inches in size, it may not fit multi-cat litter boxes well

customer_reviews.title: How does one review a product like this? Well, I'll ask the cat.
customer_reviews.text: Ms. Kitty (full name: Missus Kitty BadCrumbmble), do the liners work effectively? MKBC: Mrow! Are they better than the old ones? MKBC: Meerw? I mean, are the Extra Large ones big enough, justifying the extra cost, so they aren't falling into the pan? MKBC: Mow! Should your human servants buy them again? MKBC: <Stares apathetically into the distance> (Interviewer notes that the humans indicate this is a repeat order.) How long do they last? MKBC: Merrorw. *sniffs* I guess that means "maybe should be replaced every week, but can be replaced every two". MKBC: <bolts across the house at full speed for unknown reason> Well, I guess that ends the interview so, uh... there you have it?
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Chmara

customer_reviews.title: Largest cat pan liners available that fit jumbo cat boxes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing these cat pan liners for years, and when I recently purchased a new jumbo translucent cat box, they fit perfectly. I have 7 cats, most rescues. My female cat finds her see-through cat box with clean and durable liners helpful when entering the box to avoid getting lounced on by her younger brother when exiting.
customer_reviews.author: Swissmiss

customer_reviews.title: Drawstring doesn't drawstring.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these liners for years and years. Quite often the drawstring doesn't work in a box of bags. Lately none of the drawstrings work in any of them so I have changed brands.
customer_reviews.author: darca

customer_reviews.title: Largest liners I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have a really large litter box that most liners won't fit -- even trash can liners won't fit. This is big around and deep - so I bought a large supply!
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Durable  well made!
customer_reviews.text: These liners work very well. The drawstrings work and do not break. I love them and find them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Use them and will continue using these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have two large size cat litter boxes and they fit, (one I have to stretch about an inch but it works) .
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: Never got to use these
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use these. My house burned down with these and the cats inside
customer_reviews.author: Emmberr

customer_reviews.title: Great price- easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I always use tray liners and would travel to Walmart to get this brand. Its so convenient and easy to have them delivered to my door. The price is right also, a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: ASHA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are too thin. The cat tears at them and they leak.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and hard to find in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love using these cat litter liners
customer_reviews.text: I love using these cat litter liners, when you need to change the liner you just pull up the the draw strings and dispose of it.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

product_meta.title: Van Ness DL715 Pureness Extra Giant Drawstring Cat Pan Liner, 60-Count (4 Packs of 15)
product_meta.description: Extra giant drawstring pan liner end messy clean-ups. Durable plastic with built-in drawstring tie for simple closure. 4 Packs of 15. 60 Total
